Subjects: Simon and Judas, saints, lives of
_description: Lives of SS. Simon and Judas in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
of symone now of canane& of Iudas callit
                    thadee…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…fra þis lyfe I ma twynebut schame det & dedly
                    syne
